sentences.en: He quit Barcelona for Paris.
sentences.cn: 他离开巴塞罗那去了巴黎.

sentences.en: He quit his job after an argument with a colleague.
sentences.cn: 他和一个同事争吵后就辞职了。

sentences.en: He quit his job as an office boy in Athens.
sentences.cn: 他辞去了在雅典当办公室勤杂工的工作。

sentences.en: I got my present job when I quit the army.
sentences.cn: 我退伍后得到了现在这份工作.

sentences.en: I quit school at 16.
sentences.cn: 我十六岁辍学。

sentences.en: I've quit smoking.
sentences.cn: 我戒了烟。

sentences.en: If I don't get a pay rise I'll quit.
sentences.cn: 若不给加薪,我就不干了.

sentences.en: It's not easy to quit smoking cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 戒烟并非易事。

sentences.en: Now, Bert, quit hogging the limelight.
sentences.cn: 好了，伯特，别出风头。

sentences.en: People are now calling on the chairman to quit.
sentences.cn: 人们现在正要求主席辞职。

sentences.en: Police were called when he refused to quit the building.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝离开那座大楼，于是人们叫来了警察。

sentences.en: Quit it, Robby, or I’ll tell mom!
sentences.cn: 住手，罗比，否则我告诉妈妈！

sentences.en: Quit roughhousing, you two!
sentences.cn: 你们两个别打打闹闹了！

sentences.en: She has decided to quit show business.
sentences.cn: 她已决定退出娱乐圈。

sentences.en: She quit school as soon as she had taken her GCSEs.
sentences.cn: 她一拿到普通中等教育证书后就没再上学了。

sentences.en: The air - conditioning quit on us in mid - July.
sentences.cn: 空调 居然在七月 中旬 撇下我们.

sentences.en: The landlord gave them notice to quit the premises within seven days.
sentences.cn: 房东通知他们七天之内搬出去。

sentences.en: The majority of smokers say that they would like to quit the habit.
sentences.cn: 大多数吸烟者都说他们是想戒烟的。

sentences.en: There are no failures in life, only those who quit before success.
sentences.cn: 生活中没有失败者，只有那些在成功前就放弃的人。

sentences.en: We are glad to be quit off all the difficulties.
sentences.cn: 我们为摆脱了所有困难而高兴.

sentences.en: We're quit of all our difficulties.
sentences.cn: 我们已摆脱了所有的困难.

sentences.en: We’ve done what we can. Let’s quit.
sentences.cn: 我们已经尽力，算了吧。

sentences.en: Well, parenthetically, I was trying to quit smoking at the time.
sentences.cn: 嗯，插一句，我那时正在努力戒烟。

sentences.en: When are you going to quit acting like a martyr?
sentences.cn: 你什么时候才能不再摆出一副可怜样？

sentences.en: When he heard she was going to quIt'school, he simply blew up.
sentences.cn: 当他听到她要退学时, 他简直是怒不可遏.

sentences.en: With this view there are no failures only those who quit before success.
sentences.cn: 这样看就没有失败的人，只有那些在胜利之前就放弃的人。

words.tran_cn: 收据；免除，赦免；报酬，补偿

trans.tran_cn: 离开，放弃，离任，停止，戒掉，退出（程序）
trans.tran_en: to leave a job, school etc, especially without finishing it completely

trans.tran_cn: 停止， 放弃； 离开， 辞
trans.tran_en: to leave a house or apartment that you have been renting
